structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. ADDITIONAL GAIN TIME ALLOWANCES FOR COUNTY PRISONERS

law.catch_line: Qualifications for awards of additional gain time.

text.section:
Sec. 21-102. Qualifications for awards of additional gain time.
Qualifications for awards of additional gain time allowances for County prisoners shall be as stated in the following rules, as amended from time to time:
33-11.065 through 33-11.085 of the Florida Administrative Code.
33-11.09 of the Florida Administrative Code.
